release.action: Initial version.
While a run is running on HiSeq, send the first base report when available.
Add a hiseq.deny file that contains all the run ids to not process.
Now save a file with the pid of aozan. Now send a mail with the lock error only when the lock pid no more exists.
Remove temporary files (design, hiseq_log_ directory).
Fix issue when zip design files.
Fix issue with pid checking of already running aozan process.
Aozan has now a log file name aozan.log.
Trace exception in log file.
Issue with pid of currently running instance of Aozan.
Now get the good Basecall_Stats_FLOWCELLID path even for RTA 1.10.36.
Now show in log the new disk usage and disk free at the end of sync step and demux step.
Demux space estimation.
Fix mail message when a run is discovered.
Don't show Aozan welcome message when there is nothing to do.
Change Eoulsan version dependency. Prevent errors with Casava design CSV file with comma in cell value.
Fix typo in mail message when the end of run is discovered.

Now use Eoulsan 1.2-SNAPSHOT as dependency. New Casava sample sheet check: 1) Allow the use of a sample in several lanes; 2) new error if a sample is used by more than one project; 3) new warning if a sample exists in more than one lane; 4) new warning with the list of line where is a sample (if the number of lanes >1); 5) new errors if a sample is defined several time by with not the same sequence index.
In demux step, add Casava design warnings to log and to the success mail send to users.
The default number of threads is now the number of available processors/cores.
Add support for Casava 1.8.2.
Add Quality control report step.
When an exception is thrown, send a mail with the exception message and traceback.
When checking critical space available on HiSeq computer at every Aozan startup do not send a message if the HiSeq data path is not reachable.
In Casava design checking now only allow strings using ascii charset.
Aozan qc test do not fail if data to test does not exist.
FastQC don't throw exception if no read read.
No write the qc raw data before the xml qc report.
If an unexcepted exception is thrown in qc step, now send a mail.
Jython is now bundled in Aozan.
The quality control step now contains a optional module for assessing sample contamination using a re-implementation of FastQ Screen.
Add quality control restoration points to avoid relaunch all the analysis if a fatal error occurs before the end.
Now estimate the space needed for the current run and check if enough free space in directory for next step is available.
Add a common logger for java and python code.
Add a new module for contamination detection that use partial FASTQ files to reduce computation time without lost of information.
Add a collector for reading TileOutMetrics.bin InterOp binary files.
Add a collector for reading ErrorOutMetrics.bin InterOp binary files.
Add a collector for reading ExtractionOutMetrics.bin InterOp binary files.
The contamination detection report is now available in two formats: HTML and CSV.
Add contamination detection for paired-end runs. Two modes are available, one by mapping only the first read and the other one by mapping both reads.
Add a debug mode in configuration Aozan file.
Aozan now use FastQC 0.10.1.
Now show values for Undetermined instead of NA.
Fix missing closing tags in XSL files.
The change directory to save mapper index can now be set instead of always use /tmp.
Add an optional blast search in the 'Overrepresented Sequences' FastQC module. For unidentified sequences, a blastn is launched and the first hit is added in the FastQC report.
In Aozan configuration several FastQC parameters can now be set: a file with list of contaminants, the kmers size and if each cycles values must be displayed.
In the CASAVA/bcl2fastq samplesheet validator, add a tab to check genome sample.
Add an HiSeq data continuous synchronization mode.
Formatter file rules for eclipse or other IDE can be download on code.google.com Aozan site.
Homogeization of the configuration settings names. Now use the new Settings class to retrieve a configuration value.
In the test on demultiplexing data 'percentinlanesample', add a score that depends of the sample count in the lane.
Update Guava library version dependency from 14.0.1 to 15.1.
The mapping for contamination detection was launched in mono-thread mode.
The alias genome names file used by FastQScreen is updated and no more rewritten.
Now check main parameters from configuration before starting Aozan.
Launching steps when synchronization step is skipped without entry in infinite loop. The useful directory and archives for next steps are been created.
The QC report is now generated only if one 'qc.test' is enabled. Useful collectors are automatically called.
The 'From' field header in emails sent by Aozan was not set.
When check main paths in configuration, the paths are no more converted to lower case.
Add setting for bcl2fastq/casava compression format (.bz2, .gz, none, bzip2, gz, gzip).
Remove blast database prefix configuration setting.
Now check aozan configuration file at the beginning. Sends an email if fails.
Now check if FASTQ files are not empty before creating partial FASTQ files used by FastqScreen for contamination detection.
Aozan now requires Java 7 and use samtools/picard 1.92 as dependency.
Update email sending code. Now the email date is already set.
Compute phasing and prephasing values with RTA v1.18. Ignore null tiles metric values in Interop file.
Add a new web page to explain how to create a plugin for Aozan.
Fix compute phasing and prephasing values from tiles metric Interop file. Multiply by 100 values to get the same values as before v1.2.7.
Fix indentation in html report. Fix display error for lines > 1000 characters when processed by some mail server.
Add global tests to the QC step. This new type of test comes with some global tests.

Aozan now provide a QC module that analyzes indices of reads in the undetermined FASTQ files. For each indices, this module suggest the sample(s) and the number of reads that can be recovered using a demultiplexing step with one more mismatch that the number of mismatches has been used. This module create two reports: one per indexed lanes and one per indexed samples, both in CVS and HTML format.
Add two parameters in the Aozan configuration to run FastQC and contaminants detection on undetermined FASTQ files.

Add a new "include" directive in Aozan configuration file. With this enhancement it will be easier to use Aozan in a multi-servers context using the same core configuration file by all Aozan instances.
Aozan now use blastn from ncbi-blast+ in addition of blastall.
Aozan use now FastQC 0.11.2 which has been enhanced like previous Aozan version (bad tiles modules, blastn in Overrepresented sequences modules).
Aozan can now use the bowtie 2 mapper in FastqScreen step. The default mapper used in Aozan still bowtie 1.
Update the control quality report with a table for global tests. Add button to filter by project name displayed samples in the QC report.

Aozan now use Eoulsan 2.0-alpha1 as dependency. A bug in this new Eoulsan version forces us to add amazonaws library as Aozan dependancy. This amazonaws dependency will be remove once Aozan will use a fixed version of Eoulsan.
Add two samples tests on recovery cluster modules to get percent on raw and passing filter recovery clusters.
Aozan now use Maven 3 for building binaries and website.
Global test UndeterminedClustersPercentGlobalTest, now ignore not indexed lane.
QC global report, now button project filter by lane.
Update dependancies in pom.xml : 1) now use Eoulsan-2.0-alpha3, 2) remove dependency to aws-java-sdk only usefully with Eoulsan version 2.0-alpha1
